category: Sports Fair Committee Regulations/Article 15 (Classification of Sports Council Awards)
contents: Article 15 (Classification of Sports Association Awards) ① The person with the award authority of the Sports Council shall be the president. ② The sports association awards include the sports award and the founding commemoration award. Revised 2020. 7. 29., 2022. 1. 24. ③ The athletic award shall be given on the date of the regular general meeting every year, but may be determined differently as needed, and the award categories are as follows. Revised 2020. 7. 29. 1. Sports Awards 2. Competition Category (Grand Prize, Excellence Award, Encouragement Award) 3. Guidance Category (Grand Prize, Excellence Award, Encouragement Award) 4. Jury Category (Grand Prize, Excellence Award, Encouragement Award) 5. Life Sports Category (Grand Prize) , Excellence Award, Encouragement Award) 6. School Sports Division (Grand Prize, Excellence Award, Encouragement Award) 7. Achievement Division (Grand Prize, Excellence Award, Encouragement Award) 8. Research Division (Grand Prize, Excellence Award, Encouragement Award) 9. Sports Value Division (Grand Prize, Excellence Award, Encouragement Award) ) ④ The founding commemoration award is given every year on the founding anniversary and is given to those who have contributed to the promotion of professional sports, school sports, and recreational sports, and to those who have faithfully performed their duties and have integrity as executives and employees of sports associations, member sports organizations, member city/provincial sports associations, and city/provincial sports organizations. It is awarded to a person who has contributed to the spread of culture and serves as an example to others, and the categories of recognition are as follows: Revised 2022. 1. 24. 1. Promotion of professional sports 2. Promotion of daily sports 3. Promotion of school sports 4. Sports for overseas Koreans Promotion ⑤ Commendations may be awarded to those who have contributed to the development of domestic sports or to those who have promoted national prestige in various domestic and international competitions. ⑥ The detailed criteria and plan for awarding awards shall be determined separately.
